note.p: Landowner. Of Tedsmore Hall, Shropshire. Probably changed his surname to Owen after the death of his uncle, Hugh Owen, in 1818; signed the marriage register as ‘T. B. Owen late T. B. Hatchett’. Thomas Bulkeley Bulkeley-Owen in the probate indexes.
Denbighshire baptisms, marriages and burials Pd/55/1/7 (Ancestry.com, accessed 23 July 2022)

p.hi: England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 23 July 2022)
